title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: LS Car Meet Bonuses
content:
The Los Santos Car Meet is the heart of the city’s racing scene, and rewards can be found in every smoke-filled corner. Compete in the LS Car Meet Series to earn 2X GTA$, RP, and LS Car Meet Rep. All other sources of LS Car Meet Rep are also Doubled — perfect for climbing the ranks and unlocking perks even faster.

Plus, win three LS Car Meet races to receive an extra GTA$100,000 for completing the Weekly Challenge.
